sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import './HighendAddon.css' import range1 from '../Images/appliances/thermador-range.webp' import cooktop from '../Images/appliances/jennair-cooktop.png' import range2 from '../Images/appliances/viking-range.jpg' import refrigerator from '../Images/appliances/true-refrigerator.jpg' const HighendAddon = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const elementRef = useRef(null); const onIntersection = (entries) => { const [entry] = entries; setIsVisible(entry.isIntersecting); }; useEffect(() => { }, []); return

We repair all brands and types of large gas and electric cooking appliances

Most repairs come with a one-year warranty, satisfaction guearanteed

We will take care of your stove, cooktop, and oven

As well as of the refrigerator, wine cooler, or freezer

}; export default HighendAddon;
